summary: I AM VERY CONCERNED WITH THE BRAKES ON MY '03 CAMRY LE.  WHEN CONTINUED OR STRONG PRESSURE IS APPLIED TO THE BRAKES THE PEDAL GOES TO THE FLOOR.   ON SAID DATE I REAR-ENDED SOMEONE BECAUSE OF THIS DEFICIT.  TOYOTA LEGAL GOT INVOLVED AND SAID IT WAS 'NORMAL'.  THE BRAKING SYSTEM IS VERY DANGEROUS & MISLEADING!  *NLM
